rules.title: Game Rules
rules.html:
Story

Level 1 – The Jealous Farmer’s Ranch: Pepe must rescue his fiancée from a locked hut. The farmer unleashes his animals on intruders – from cheeky chickens and mini-chickens to a furious endboss. Collect resources, dodge attacks and fight your way to the hut gate.

To be continued: Future chapters will introduce the wicked sister, nosy neighbors and new enemies like cows and crows – a long journey with Super-Mario or Crash-Bandicoot vibes. ¡muy loco!

Controls

  • ← / → Move left/right
  • Space Jump
  • D Throw bottle
  • F Supernova (if available)
  • Pause via the top UI bar • Close overlays with ESC

Collectibles

  • Bottles – ranged damage vs. chickens & boss
  • Hearts – restore health
  • Coins – score & future unlocks
  • Whiskey – energy/power-up (useful for special attacks)

Enemies

  • Chicken – pesky but predictable
  • Mini-chicken – fast; defeat by jumping on it
  • Endboss – reacts on sight; vary pace & distance

Tips

  • Jump on small enemies to conserve ammo.
  • Throw bottles while moving and keep your distance.
  • Watch your health; pick up hearts in time.
  • Stay mobile vs. the boss and wait for openings.

Goal (Level 1)

Reach the ranch gate, defeat the endboss and open the way to the hut to free Pepe’s fiancée. Buena suerte!
